message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1,200,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the opportunity, $1,200,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product. This is my final offer, as I have another opportunity lined up for the same product.  Let me know if you're interested.

I understand that $1,000,000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
